short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily share your courses without distractions from comments or headers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your eLearning experience with my updated Chrome extension, designed for Articulate users who want to share their courses seamlessly, focusing solely on content without distractions.

This latest version introduces a powerful new feature: the ability to save your preview links directly within the extension. Now, you can organize your links by title and category, making it easier than ever to find and share the exact link you need, whenever you need it.
